object.name: Gift
object.description: This object represents a gift that can be sent by the bot.
object.html_description: This object represents a gift that can be sent by the bot.
object.rst_description: This object represents a gift that can be sent by the bot.

annotations.description: The sticker that represents the gift
annotations.rst_description: The sticker that represents the gift
annotations.name: sticker

annotations.description: The number of Telegram Stars that must be paid to send the sticker
annotations.html_description: The number of Telegram Stars that must be paid to send the sticker
annotations.rst_description: The number of Telegram Stars that must be paid to send the sticker
annotations.name: star_count

annotations.description: The number of Telegram Stars that must be paid to upgrade the gift to a unique one
annotations.html_description: Optional. The number of Telegram Stars that must be paid to upgrade the gift to a unique one
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. The number of Telegram Stars that must be paid to upgrade the gift to a unique one
annotations.name: upgrade_star_count

annotations.description: True, if the gift can only be purchased by Telegram Premium subscribers
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the gift can only be purchased by Telegram Premium subscribers
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if the gift can only be purchased by Telegram Premium subscribers
annotations.name: is_premium

annotations.description: True, if the gift can be used (after being upgraded) to customize a user's appearance
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the gift can be used (after being upgraded) to customize a user's appearance
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if the gift can be used (after being upgraded) to customize a user's appearance
annotations.name: has_colors

annotations.description: The total number of gifts of this type that can be sent by all users; for limited gifts only
annotations.html_description: Optional. The total number of gifts of this type that can be sent by all users; for limited gifts only
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. The total number of gifts of this type that can be sent by all users; for limited gifts only
annotations.name: total_count

annotations.description: The number of remaining gifts of this type that can be sent by all users; for limited gifts only
annotations.html_description: Optional. The number of remaining gifts of this type that can be sent by all users; for limited gifts only
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. The number of remaining gifts of this type that can be sent by all users; for limited gifts only
annotations.name: remaining_count

annotations.description: The total number of gifts of this type that can be sent by the bot; for limited gifts only
annotations.html_description: Optional. The total number of gifts of this type that can be sent by the bot; for limited gifts only
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. The total number of gifts of this type that can be sent by the bot; for limited gifts only
annotations.name: personal_total_count

annotations.description: The number of remaining gifts of this type that can be sent by the bot; for limited gifts only
annotations.html_description: Optional. The number of remaining gifts of this type that can be sent by the bot; for limited gifts only
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. The number of remaining gifts of this type that can be sent by the bot; for limited gifts only
annotations.name: personal_remaining_count

annotations.description: The total number of different unique gifts that can be obtained by upgrading the gift
annotations.html_description: Optional. The total number of different unique gifts that can be obtained by upgrading the gift
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. The total number of different unique gifts that can be obtained by upgrading the gift
annotations.name: unique_gift_variant_count

annotations.description: Information about the chat that published the gift
annotations.html_description: Optional. Information about the chat that published the gift
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Information about the chat that published the gift
annotations.name: publisher_chat
